PersonalStatement.text: Jonathan Burgess, born on 1991-02-02, is a Female based in West Jackson, Venezuela. She is Married and holds Vietnamese nationality. Currently working at Patterson Inc.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Collins, Watson and Ramirez from 2009 to 2020.
Senior HR Manager at Patterson Inc, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from Cardiff University
Master's in Engineering from Beijing Foreign Studies University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys reading.
